name: Santa's Factory (Notchella)
description:
You are a new elf in Santa's factory, complete tasks to earn Elf Tokens and upgrade your room. Use your Elf Points to keep track of your progress.

You choose your character, with a choice of 4 sprites.

Game completed in 2-3 days.

All visual and audio assets are created by RPG Maker studios, not me. The game itself has been created by me.

Submission for Neon Blue Studio's December Game Jam.
